dcterms:creator: Alexey Dosovitskiy
German Ros
Felipe Codevilla
Antonio Lopez
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: A real-world dataset collected using a roof-mounted prototype LiDAR on a vehicle driving around a North American city. It includes three-echo point clouds along with ambient and reflectance values for each point, consisting of 35,850 frames from various driving scenes.
dcterms:title: Real Dataset

dcterms:creator: Alexey Dosovitskiy
German Ros
Felipe Codevilla
Antonio Lopez
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset collected using the CARLA simulator, which includes three-echo point clouds with reflectance values and approximated ambient values. It consists of 26,043 frames for training and 8,682 frames for testing, with a wide range of ground truth annotations.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset
